page.title: 10Farming In The Gourdon Area
page.content: A lot of the land in the Benholm/Gourdon Hill area belongs to Mr. Buchan who lives at Nether Benholm and farms Nether Benholm, Nether Knox and Middle Knox. He has 770 acres approximately. Most of the land is used for{arable farming}and the crops grown are mostly{oil seed rape, {barley, wheat and protein peas.}The farmers grow a lot of oil seed rape because they get a subsidy. The farmer harvests the rape, dries it and sends it down to Glasgow. From there is gets used to make cooking oil. The land that isn't used for crops is used for rough pasture. The farmer uses 340 acres for the{sheep.}He also keeps {bulls.}He keeps them in the cattle court where they are fed barley and kept for 1 year before going to the mart to be sold.
